import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Cog6ToothIcon, BellIcon, HandRaisedIcon, FaceSmileIcon, BookmarkIcon, UsersIcon, } from '@heroicons/react/24/solid'; import NavBar from '../components/NavBar'; import SaveButton from '../components/SaveButton'; const Dashboard = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [active, setActive] = useState(null); const navItems = [ { id: 'desafios', label: 'desafios', icon: HandRaisedIcon, to: '/challenges' }, { id: 'feed', label: 'feed', icon: FaceSmileIcon, to: '/feed' }, { id: 'home', label: 'newsletter', icon: BookmarkIcon, to: '/newsletter' }, { id: 'comunidade', label: 'comunidade', icon: UsersIcon, to: '/community' }, ]; return (
{ e.currentTarget.src = 'https://via.placeholder.com/128'; }} className="h-full w-full object-cover" />

); }; export default Dashboard;
